This page contains information about the survey run by ACM SIGPLAN in March 2015 on issues related to open access.

The survey is a Google form with a summary of responses available [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1Jl3UvFX9zae9F9vvjK6HfCWjJV2ZF6RWSX78O6Eee94/viewanalytics#start=publishanalytics).

The survey was introduced with the following document intended to provide context [here](http://goo.gl/vlCtn2).

The raw data in CSV format is [here](http://janvitek.org/who/Who.csv).

The summary of the results prepared by SIGPLAN is [here](http://janvitek.org/whoowns.html).

The R Mardown code that produced the summary (including the statistics) is [here](http://janvitek.org/who/whoowns.rmd).


### Acknoweledgments

The survey was prepared by Jan Vitek for the SIGPLAN EC with input from Jeremy Gibbons, Mike Hicks, Shriram Krishnamurthi and Alex Wolf.
